About Finding & Collecting | About Contributing

About Connecting


Tutorial: Connecting with Groups



CONNECTING ON CURRIKI

  • Get -- or give -- constructive feedback on curricula and teaching practices.

  • Start or join a group to share existing curricula or collaborate on something new.

  • Support your own work by linking up with educators in this growing global community.



HOW TO CONNECT


Provide Feedback & Send Resources to Friends

Collaborate & Communicate with Members in a Group

Each resource on Curriki has a "Comments" tab where you can provide ideas or feedback, or ask questions. Use the "Send to a Friend" link to share resources you like.

 » View a Sample Comment
 » How to rate and comment

New groups are always forming. Connect with other Curriki members working in your subject area, or start your own group.

 » View Featured Groups
 » Browse Groups by Subject
 » Create a New Group

WHAT CONNECTIONS DO YOU WANT?

  • Curriki needs input from the member community to prioritize new features and improvements. Do you want discussion boards? The ability to find a member with similar interests, or send a member a message?
